name: Celebratory Kite: Prosperity and Wealth
description: A kite in the shape of the Jade Chamber, made of bamboo, paper, and other such materials. It can be seen at kite stalls during the Lantern Rite festival, and is this year's newest model.\nIn Liyue, this style of kite symbolizes prosperity, and as an ever-popular model, demand has always outstripped supply. Rumor has it that even adepti are enamored of this "lucky" kite, thus proving just how popular it is.
